name: AntiBodies
description:
AntiBodies

Click HERE To Launch
Play in a Web GL enabled browser.

Spend time  in a surreal world of nonbinary, trans, and female identifying people with eating disorders and body dysmorphia. 

The avatars in AntiBodies are pro-Anorexic yogis, cyber-Hysterics, and rubber-boned rag-dolls. The text and interviews are from virtual Pro Ana chats as well as anonymous interviews with people  who struggle with eating disorders and body dysmorphia/ dysphoria. 

This game asks you to spend time with people with  unhealthy self-images in order to communicate how difficult it is for some people to self-care. Many people struggle with body image and properly caring for their physical bodies. As a metaphorical distorted mirror of body issues, AntiBodies asks us  to live in and care for ones own body without judgment.
